chapter.verse: GOD, who gets invited to dinner at your place? How do we get on your guest list?
"Walk straight, act right, tell the truth.
"Don't hurt your friend, don't blame your neighbor;
despise the despicable. "Keep your word even when it costs you,
make an honest living, never take a bribe. "You'll never get blacklisted if you live like this." A David song
